definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :La 5:15 dance;—abs. ´[[מ]] Ps 30:12 + 3 t.; cstr. [[מְחוֹל]] Je 31:4; [[מְחוֹלֵנוּ]] La 5:15; —dance, token of joyousness Ps 30:12 (opp. [[מספד]]), Je 31:4, Je 31:13 (cf. v:b), La 5:15 (opp. [[אֵבֶּל]]); act of praise to ´[[י]] Ps 149:3, Ps 150:4; accompanied by timbrel ([[תּׂף]]) and sometimes other instruments Ps 149:3, Ps 149:4, Je 31:13.
